title: [Neuroscience] The active ingredient of the hallucinogenic tea ayahuasca, DMT, positively regulates adult neurogenesis both in vitro and in vivo. Also, researchers observed that DMT increases performance on memory tests in rodents

[Neuroscience] Using an fMRI, scientists scanned people's brains as they watched an episode of the TV show "Sherlock". They found our brains can successfully predict others' actions up to about 13 seconds into the future, on average.
